1e60e08c-162e-4318-bfa7-73769be29114.description: Whether you want to top up your knowledge or work towards a career in the construction industry, this entry level course is for you .You will learn how important site safety is in a construction environment and be able to demonstrate prior knowledge when progressing into further learning. You will also gain an understanding of the principles of safe risk assessment and knowledge of how to keep yourself and others safe in a busy construction environment.
1e60e08c-162e-4318-bfa7-73769be29114.name: Health and Safety in Construction Environment

badge_template_activities.title: Identify the purpose of a risk assessment
Define the meaning of accidents, near misses, hazards, and risks.
Identify the importance of accident reporting in a construction environment
Demonstrate safe manual handling procedures
Highlight the importance of using site safety equipment
Identify the hazards of working at height
Demonstrate knowledge of how hazards can be controlled
Identify the regulations that control working at height
Identify substances that are hazardous to health
Identify how to store combustibles and chemicals
Demonstrate understanding of asbestos and the dangers of exposure
Identify hazards in relation to working with plant and equipment
Demonstrate knowledge of safe movement around vehicles
Understand the importance of method statements
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

eafd04c9-26b1-4281-bcc7-d2b7ebf85c89.description: An award-winning executive development programme designed to help professionals, mangers and emerging leaders become strategy consultants by empowering them to analyse any organisation and spot opportunities that will drive change. Participants will learn the most up-to-date, cutting-edge frameworks and methodologies (state of the art as of 2022) used by management consultants and business advisors to help an organisation rise to new levels of competitive performance.
eafd04c9-26b1-4281-bcc7-d2b7ebf85c89.name: Strategy Consultant

badge_template_activities.title: Understand how to define an organisation’s key commercial priorities by carrying out an industry analysis
Illustrate an organisation’s market position by drawing a Strategy Canvas
Determine which strategies will be most effective for an organisation
Identify the key assets within an organisation by drawing a Key Asset Map, revealing the organisation’s source of competitive advantage
Interpret change within a market
Understand how an organisation can respond to change in a superior manner to the competition
Gain an appreciation of corporate strategy and of how their organisation can pursue new opportunities in the form of new products, services and geographical markets.

d1bc4dce-ee57-4c64-bafc-d7d78bd46a0f.description: This course will give you all the information you need to know about working in a warehouse environment, including Health and Safety, Manual Handling, picking methods and preparation of goods for packing.
d1bc4dce-ee57-4c64-bafc-d7d78bd46a0f.name: Introduction to Warehousing and Storage

badge_template_activities.title: Understand Health & Safety rights and responsibilities including RIDDOR & CoSHH, fire regulations and substance control in a warehouse setting and understand how to prevent and deal with accidents.

Understand the importance of effective working relationships including the importance of good communication methods and key policies, including equality and diversity and equal opportunities, for developing effective working relationships
Understand the four key areas of manual handling and identify how to move goods safely
Understand picking methods and systems when picking goods. Be able to list the potential problems that can occur when picking goods and how to deal with these.
Understand how to prepare goods for packing, including the use of different wrapping & packing materials & equipment

Understand what to look for when conducting Quality Control checks prior to packing goods to ensure goods arrive at the customer in optimum condition and state the action you would take should you encounter any problems

Understand how to correctly, and safely, stack goods, considering their height, weight and centre of gravity, prior to moving them to the dispatch area. Understand what checks are required before moving the goods to the dispatch area.
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

5f37c802-e58a-4c69-8447-f6f143f4cf06.description: An executive management course to support SMEs to boost their business performance and growth potential. Small business leaders will develop their strategic skills to increase their business’s long-term productivity, resilience and capacity to innovate.
5f37c802-e58a-4c69-8447-f6f143f4cf06.name: Help to Grow; Management Course

badge_template_activities.title: Be aware of factors that drive productivity and growth in SMEs and have considered what this means in their own business context
Understand the need and benefits of embedding equality, diversity and inclusion practices within their business and have started to use relevant tools and resources to support this
Have reviewed the culture, values and decision-making in their business in relation to sustainability principles and are committed to implementing responsible business practices
Understand how to innovate their business model, and have developed a strategic approach to successfully adopting and investing in new and digital technologies to drive competitive advantage
Have developed their leadership and management skills and started to facilitate the introduction of management practices to enhance employee wellbeing and effective teams through employee engagement
Have identified key domestic and export markets for their business and strategies for market segmentation, positioning and targeting in the context of their competitive environment

Have identified strategies to improve operational efficiency in their business, are aware of key elements and principles of financial management and understand the value of data analytics and key metrics to monitor growth and support strategic decision making
Have collaborated with others in the business to develop an action plan for growth and productivity including the identification of key tools and metrics

fc13eb54-eab8-44dd-8073-d1e045fd9848.description: The course consists of three units which help you understand the skills and knowledge you require to run a business, examines how to market your business and looks at how to manage your finances. Business tutors and successful entrepreneurs feature throughout the episodes - sharing their wisdom, knowledge and top tips with learners.
fc13eb54-eab8-44dd-8073-d1e045fd9848.name: Mind your own Business

badge_template_activities.title: Exploring have you got what it takes to be your own boss? Personal finance considerations requires to run a business including survival budget tips. How to balance business and personal life.
Knowledge and skills required to succeed in business. Barriers you may face when starting a business and how to overcome them. What is the best thing about running your own business
Understanding Market research , what is it? Why is it important ? How do businesses use it? How to use different promotional methods including traditional media, digital and social media
How do businesses deliver their products and services to the customer ? What is customer satisfaction and how can this be measured?

How to plan your business finances . How to do business planning and cash flow. How to use documents to plan and record your business finances. How to do business plans and cash flow forecast. The importance of good record keeping .
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

bd18915d-1990-4417-81f7-d099892eb2d8.description: An exclusive professional development programme, for UWE Alumni. The Trailblazer Programme blends face-to-face sessions with online interactive sessions. Participants are motivated to maximise personal impact, boost effectiveness and develop leadership skills.
bd18915d-1990-4417-81f7-d099892eb2d8.name: Trailblazer 2022

badge_template_activities.title: How to apply entrepreneurial characteristics in the workplace and creating opportunities to advance your career.
Understanding 'Inclusive Leadership' and to start developing the necessary knowledge, motivation, and skills to identify where to start from in order to become an inclusive leader.
Learning key leadership skills and looking at leadership practices to help prepare for a career in leadership or enhance existing practice.
Developing coaching and mentoring skills to enhance performance and encourage self-exploration.

023c9a86-8658-4216-854f-f85817cb0701.description: The role of the mentor on the Help To Grow programme is to support participants to develop their Growth Action Plans and help them better understand the opportunities available to their business.
023c9a86-8658-4216-854f-f85817cb0701.name: Help to Grow Mentor

badge_template_activities.title: What is mentoring?
Building rapport
Contracting the objectives of the mentoring relationship
Ethical considerations of confidentiality
Listening
Questioning

65d41745-b6b0-4a6f-8636-3089c44abb6b.description: This badge has been issued to attendees of the Hackathon 2022 event by UWE. Students from Law, business and entrepreneurship worked with Entrepreneurs to solve the problems that they are facing in their entrepreneurial journey. Teams were created to solve the problems and the resolutions pitched in front of a panel of business experts
65d41745-b6b0-4a6f-8636-3089c44abb6b.name: Hackathon 2022

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance and participation at the 2022 Hackathon
Understanding the challenges and opportunities of the entrepreneurial journey
Working effectively as a team to identify solutions or new opportunities within a business.
Communicating clearly and concisely the teams proposed solutions to a panel of business experts.

0f8b478b-cf51-435e-bfc4-13f5cc379a6e.description: A 3-month programme where students from University Arts London, UWE, Taylors, and MTA working with refugees in Malaysia to solve problems around Education and Wellbeing by following a design thinking process. During the programme the participants were weekly mentored by community leaders from organizations working in these areas in Malaysia (e.g. Kachin Refugee Committee, Fugee, and Health Equity Initiatives) and coached by team coaches from those institutions.
0f8b478b-cf51-435e-bfc4-13f5cc379a6e.name: Global Refugee Challenge

badge_template_activities.title: Attendance and participation at the Global Refugee Challenge and weekly meetings
Understanding the challenges and opportunities refugees in Malaysia face in their education and entrepreneurial journey.
Working effectively in a global virtual team to identify and create sustainable solutions.
Communicating clearly and concisely the teams proposed solutions to a panel of business experts, mentors, and funding organizations.

b6792753-2fa4-4b5e-98b7-5d92c81f6159.description: The course is designed to introduce you to the digital world, to help you in your search for work. The course will take you on a journey from how to search effectively online for jobs, identify if information you find online is relevant and accurate, keeping yourself safe from viruses and other attacks, ensuring your privacy is maintained, and the legal aspects of dealing with people’s data, through to applying for jobs by email and using social media to develop your career prospects
b6792753-2fa4-4b5e-98b7-5d92c81f6159.name: Workplace Digital Skills

badge_template_activities.title: Identify and understand the purpose of search engines
Explain how an internet search can help in finding a job
Identify the meaning and explain the usage of the acronym C.R.A.A.P
Demonstrate knowledge of safe and reliable web addresses
Demonstrate understanding of effective file storage
Identify threats to data
Explain the meaning of a digital footprint
Demonstrate an understanding of the storage and protection of personal data.
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

8be591eb-4766-4bfc-a395-dac8002b97de.description: An absorbing and hands-on 4 hour course to introduce complete beginners to playing a drum kit, from how to hold your drum sticks to understanding the sound and purpose of different drums and cymbals. Learn some simple beats and fills and the core theory drummers need to know to play with other people. Drum sticks and all kit supplied in lessons.
8be591eb-4766-4bfc-a395-dac8002b97de.name: Introduction to Drums

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate correct stick hold and posture
Demonstrate standard 8 beat
Demonstrate some simple fills
Understand tempo and pulse

083536f3-7419-46ab-ba4f-b71e120d255b.description: An enjoyable and accessible 4 hour course introducing complete beginners to the piano including basic principles of posture, music-reading and theory, suitable for learning to play by ear or for those interested in reading music. Learners will acquire essential skills to continue learning piano via books or videos and understand how to create a successful practice regime, all delivered on the highest quality digital and acoustic pianos.
083536f3-7419-46ab-ba4f-b71e120d255b.name: Introduction to Piano

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate correct playing posture
Understand rules of reading piano music
Understand how to construct a variety of chords
Demonstrate two-handed coordination

cfb2eaae-333c-4acb-8d15-f3222a5efb56.description: A practical and easy-to-understand 8 hour introduction to Apple’s world class music software ‘Logic’. Understand the layout of this powerful system and get started making your own tracks with both MIDI and audio content all delivered by an experienced music producer who can introduce you to more advanced functions including plug-ins, mixing and mastering if you wish. Macbooks, MIDI keyboards and audio equipment all supplied.
cfb2eaae-333c-4acb-8d15-f3222a5efb56.name: Introduction to Logic Pro

badge_template_activities.title: Understand the layout of Logic system
Demonstrate recording and editing tracks using MIDI
Demonstrate recording audio tracks
Understand the use of effects

d9d9087d-7c2e-4e43-b8ec-74074198c9bf.description: A confidence-building 4 hour course to help you understand and control your singing voice across different registers, develop your breathing technique to better support vocal production and handle nerves well, including tuning and styling techniques such as vibrato.
d9d9087d-7c2e-4e43-b8ec-74074198c9bf.name: Introduction to Singing

badge_template_activities.title: Developing breathing technique
Understanding your range and register
Developing tuning and pitching technique
Approaches to performance and handling nerves

9163d067-70a1-4f65-8e5c-127135140a43.description: This individual has successfully completed 'Managing projects successfully' programme from the University of the West of England. They have participated in practical learning to develop an understanding of how projects should be run and managed. They are equipped with a range of options and methods to utilise in ensuring the effective delivery of project - within budget and on time.
9163d067-70a1-4f65-8e5c-127135140a43.name: Managing a Project Successfully

badge_template_activities.title: This individual has successfully completed a 2 day practical programme from the University of they West of England in Managing projects effectively.
This individual has developed their skills to plan the implementation of a project and communicate it effectively with colleagues and stakeholders.
This individual has developed their skills in order to implement a project plan, monitoring progress against agreed targets and use feedback to critically evaluate their performance.
This individual is able to create a self-development plan, in order to improve their own performance in managing projects.

932f2b0d-2110-48e4-899a-148bf0110867.description: A collaborative and welcoming 4 hour course for songwriters of any background or experience level, to help you get started, get out of a rut and try some new approaches to completing songs including tips and tricks for developing melodies, chord sequences and lyrics. Many instruments available in sessions plus full PA and mics.
932f2b0d-2110-48e4-899a-148bf0110867.name: Approaches to Song Writing

badge_template_activities.title: Techniques for lyric development
Understanding chord progressions and keys
Techniques for developing melodies
Exploring arrangement and song structure

0e127000-6851-453c-9335-16c93f6430a4.description: Candidates will learn how to plan, research and produce a successful logo with a vocational theme that is fit for purpose. Creative Design is split into four units (six episodes) and will give learners easy to-follow stepping stones for the preparation and design of their marketing logo.
0e127000-6851-453c-9335-16c93f6430a4.name: Creative Design for Enterprise

badge_template_activities.title: Outline five key health and safety rules for a graphic design studio
Explain how to use a range of at least five tools and materials safely
Give five examples of different assignments that a graphic designer may undertake
Outline four key responsibilities of a freelance graphic designer
State five key skills that are important to a job in graphic design that they already hold
Use key tools, techniques and materials to achieve different effects
Experiment with their chosen material
Review the usefulness and effectiveness of their experiments
Identify sources of inspiration for a logo design and produce five different designs
Carry out research and choose a final design
Explain the different stages of their design process
Identify five key skills that they can develop for a successful career in design
Follow a brief plan and design a logo
State what worked well and why
Identify areas for improvement
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

skills.name: Identify tools and materials for use in design

55fdbeb7-bbd1-41aa-ae86-79f973bd6397.description: This course is ideal for anyone who either enjoys writing or would like to know more about written composition. No experience is necessary. The course is written in association with the Scottish Book Trust and features award winning writer, Phil Earle, who will take you step by step through the writing process.
55fdbeb7-bbd1-41aa-ae86-79f973bd6397.name: Creative Writing

badge_template_activities.title: Write a brief description of their surroundings
List five places where writers can gain inspiration
Produce a brief piece of writing based on a real world event
Describe their home town
Write brief descriptions of different types of setting
Create a character using a character template
Continue developing the character using different techniques
Plan and plot the structure of their story
Use real world speech to help write interesting dialogue
Write a piece of creative writing which uses all the skills learnt on the course
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

84dd04d0-4e93-4a23-a75a-ec0cc41a3577.description: This course will give you a great introduction to the knowledge and skills required to work in a customer service role. Understand why good customer service is important and how to deliver customer satisfaction. Find out how an organisation plans and delivers their customer service. Understand how to work as part of a team while maintaining required standards of professionalism.
84dd04d0-4e93-4a23-a75a-ec0cc41a3577.name: Customer Service

badge_template_activities.title: Explain the definition of customer service
Describe four different customer needs which could affect customer service requirements
Define a service offer and three things which it may include
Identify four different ways an organisation can deliver customer service and four different types of service that could be offered
Describe key practices and procedures used to ensure effective customer service
Outline key legislation, regulations and health & safety aspects which must be considered when offering customer service.
Describe three different job roles within a customer service team
Explain how positive and negative behaviours can affect teamwork
List different sources of product and service information
Describe different methods of keeping customer information confidential
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

skills.name: How to deliver good customer service
How to plan good customer service

864a38ed-38db-4eb7-b2bc-ba91e3af5428.description: This course is all about achieving a healthier body and how to reach fitness goals; an ideal entry level course for those who want a career in the health and fitness industry. It covers aspects of health and fitness, together with the benefits of exercise and a healthy diet. It also examines how to improve your health and fitness by establishing goals, routines and looking at safety and hygiene while you train.
864a38ed-38db-4eb7-b2bc-ba91e3af5428.name: Fitness for Life

badge_template_activities.title: List examples of health and fitness
Describe skills which relate to fitness
Identify the benefits of different food groups
Describe and explain what we mean by structured exercise
List 3 steps that should be considered before doing any exercise
Describe and explain what is meant by each section of SMART
Describe and explain what can be done before, during and after your training session in order to prevent injury
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

cb18cc1d-76d9-42af-816d-cd869a918207.description: In our Food Hygiene Awareness course you will gain a basic understanding of good food hygiene practices, and also look at the four C’s: Cross contamination, cleaning, chilling and cooking. This bite sized Food Hygiene course covers all of the essential elements of working with food and provides the student with the current best hygiene and food preparation practices.
cb18cc1d-76d9-42af-816d-cd869a918207.name: Food Hygiene Awareness

badge_template_activities.title: Identify the reasons and benefits of hand washing
Describe and explain how you should wash your hands
Describe and explain how cross contamination can happen
Explain why it is important to check regularly for pests
Explain why it is important to chill food
Identify how soon leftovers should be refrigerated and at what temperature food should be chilled
Explain why food should be chilled as quickly as possible after preparation
List two ways how we can speed up the process of cooling down large pans of food
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

f58cac1b-4ce8-48f5-80d2-60b057bbb3df.description: An accessible and practical 8 hour introduction to breakthrough music production software Ableton Live. Find out how to navigate around this powerful system and understand how to use its unique capabilities including integrating playing loops in live performances. Learn how to record both MIDI and audio and be able to create an original track.
f58cac1b-4ce8-48f5-80d2-60b057bbb3df.name: Introduction to Ableton Live

badge_template_activities.title: Understand the layout of Ableton system
Demonstrate recording and editing clips and tracks using MIDI
Demonstrate recording audio clips and tracks
Understand the use of clips to create tracks or performances

c6d09f70-d408-465a-a972-6609865e2786.description: An exciting and practical 4 hour course introducing complete beginners to playing the guitar, including how to hold the instrument so that a consistently good sound is produced. Get to grips with different strumming techniques and finger picking, learn enough chord shapes to start playing some songs, as well as understanding how to play and label chords using barre technique so you can read chord sheets and chord boxes successfully. Electric and acoustic guitars available for your use in lessons
c6d09f70-d408-465a-a972-6609865e2786.name: Introduction to Guitar

badge_template_activities.title: Name and play a variety of open chords and power chords
Demonstrate basic strumming patterns
Introduction to barre chords and scales
Demonstrate correct finger picking technique

9de239e0-0af6-4d8d-bb76-8c5a9c610bcd.description: This course is ideal for anyone who wants to start out on the road to becoming a large goods vehicle (LGV) driver. This course uses the official DVSA question banks and hazard perception testing clips to make this as close to the real-world tests as it’s possible to get.
9de239e0-0af6-4d8d-bb76-8c5a9c610bcd.name: Introduction to LGV Theory Test

badge_template_activities.title: Demonstrate knowledge of different LGV licences
Understand legislation changes
Demonstrate an understanding of application requirements
Identify medical needs and exemptions
Demonstrate an understanding of the driving hours of an LGV driver
Identify potential hours of driving whilst tired
Identify active and potential hazards in different situations
Explain why a tachograph is needed
Demonstrate an understanding of different symbols
Demonstrate an understanding of vehicle checks
Identify the parts of the vehicle that needs to be included in checks
Understand the hazards of high wind conditions
Demonstrate knowledge of driving in adverse conditions
Identify the rules of motorway driving
Demonstrate knowledge of vehicle weights
Identify signage related to the carriage of hazardous materials
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation

skills.name: Identify different classifications of LGV vehicles

cd862040-56f0-4c3a-a9bd-a566dbcaa06a.description: JobSmart is all about getting candidates ‘interview-ready’ and prepared for the world of work. This course will equip you with the skills to work in today’s modern economy and you will gain a valuable insight into the employability skills needed to succeed in finding and keeping the right job.
cd862040-56f0-4c3a-a9bd-a566dbcaa06a.name: Job Smart

badge_template_activities.title: Define the four mindsets
State why the four mindsets will be important to an employer
Give examples of when they have displayed these mindset qualities
Identify a mindset quality that they can improve
State how they will improve this quality
Identify their skills, abilities, strengths and what they are interested in
Identify potential job roles related to these skills, abilities, strengths and interests
Choose the most appropriate job role
Identify who to contact to find out information about the role they are applying for
Give examples of appropriate speaking and listening skills they need to demonstrate during the interview
Identify a problem they have encountered or may encounter in the place of work
Identify a possible solution to the problem
Identify sources of support to help solve the problem
Students have been assessed and have achieved in excess of 80% to gain the accreditation
